clearColors() - Method in class surface.Surface
Set the colors array to null.
clearTexture() - Method in class surface.Surface
This will clear the texture that you have set with the setTexture method.
colors() - Method in class surface.Surface
If you has set colors for your surface this function gives you an array which hold the color for every point of the surface.
coords() - Method in class surface.Surface
Use this method to get an array holding the coordinates of the surface.
